definition: rule (e.g. of science)/law of behavior/regular pattern/rhythm/discipline

sentences.english: Applying the market rule to electronic unfair competition disputes is not always easy.
sentences.chinese: 运用该市场规律来消除电子不正当竞争并不容易。

sentences.english: Oil content and accumulation of Acer truncatum samara were studied.
sentences.chinese: 对元宝枫翅果油脂含量和累积规律进行了研究。

sentences.english: Financial college students' quality education has its special inner regularity.
sentences.chinese: 财经类专业大学生的素质教育有其独特的内在规律性。

sentences.english: In this article the regularity of amino acid replacement among homologues insulins was explored.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了同源胰岛素间氨基酸取代的规律性。

sentences.english: This is the noumenon affirmation of the historical law.
sentences.chinese: 这是在本体论层面对历史规律存在的肯定。

sentences.english: The law of value is determined by socially necessary labour time.
sentences.chinese: 价值规律是商品价值由社会必要劳动时间决定的规律。

sentences.english: The law of value is determined by socially necessary labour time.
sentences.chinese: 价值规律是商品价值由社会必要劳动时间决定的规律。

sentences.english: Objective: To analyse the regularity of various chromosome anomalies among heredity inquires.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨各类遗传咨询者染色体核型异常发生规律。

sentences.english: If you study regularly each day, little by little your vocabulary of English words will increase.
sentences.chinese: 如果你每天有规律地学习，你的英文字汇将逐渐增加。

sentences.english: “It’s just the laws of physics, ” explained Banos.
The result show that all the natural amino-acids will follow the rule of helix theory.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，氨基酸类化合物也遵从螺旋理论的规律。

sentences.english: The features of aeromagnetic gradient anomalies about the gold deposits are summarized.
sentences.chinese: 总结了金矿床上航磁梯度异常的变化规律。

sentences.english: That is one of the most invariable rules of social behavior.
sentences.chinese: 这是最永恒的社会行为规律之一。

sentences.english: Objective To talk about the regularity and characteristic of blind reflex of patients of with brain steam trauma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑干损伤患者瞬目反射的规律及特点。

sentences.english: The general rules of avian community succession.
sentences.chinese: 崇明东滩湿地鸟类群落的演替规律。

sentences.english: It is discussed the occurrence and harmfulness of valsa sordida of poplar in 4 aspects.
sentences.chinese: 从4个方面论述了杨树烂皮病的发生规律及危害性。

definition: to follow/to abide by/to comply with/compliance
scientific law (e.g. law of conservation of energy)/(in human affairs) a generalization based on observation (e.g. "power corrupts")
nothing much changes (idiom); always the same/stuck in a rut
